璾字的基本解释

璾
jì
玉病。

璾
zī
　ㄗˉ
盛黍稷同于祀祭的器物。
似玉的美石。

璾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《集韻》在禮切，上薺，從。］
玉病。
[②]［zī］
［《集韻》津私切，平脂，精。］
(1)同“齍”。在器的祀谷。
(2)同“齍”。盛谷物的祭器。
(3)似玉的石。

璾字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璾； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页744第16
【集韻】在禮切，音薺。玉病謂之璾。　又津私切，音咨。黍稷在器，以祀者。與齍同。

璾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
璾字的起名意思

似玉的美石。

Basic explanation of words
Jing
jì
Jade disease.
Jing
zī
ㄗˉ
Sheng millet is the same as the sacrificial artifacts.
Beautiful stone like jade.
Jing
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Jiyun" in Liqie, on the water chestnut, from. ]
Jade disease.
[②]［zī］
["Ji Yun" Jin private cut, flat fat, fine. ]
(1) Same as "齍". In Qi's Valley of Sacrifice.
(2) Same as "齍". Sacrificial vessel for holding grain.
(3) Stone like jade.
Jing
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璾; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 744 No. 16
[Jiyun] In Liqie, the sound is the sound. Jade disease is called 璾.　Individually and privately, voice counseling. The millet is in the implement, the one who worships. Same as 齍.
